text: <@U66GD0880> should we rebuild llvm with `RelWithDebInfo` instead of `Release` <https://github.com/JuliaPackaging/Yggdrasil/blob/f557f808424f9ce29f6cebae68649079b0b2777e/0_RootFS/llvm_common.jl#L43>?
